task.summary: Add callback to send method to log failures when messages are sent.
Add and configure a Junit test for the EventHubs' DispatcherController.
Run app script for EventHub service.
Document how to generate the azure credential file.
Add Quick Start to the Kafka-Dispatcher documentation.
Move common documentation at root level.
Some changes and new configuration to work with Azure EventHubs.
Load all kafka properties from the configuration file.
Describe the settings for the bootstrap-servers option.
Set configuration for a local Kafka broker. Explain the values in the documentation.
Avoid to invoke exitValue on an alive process.
Publish data in POST with the new 'publish-data' method on the controller.
New test for the publish-data method.
Add multiline trigger sample. Tweak doc.
Wrap local commands to support I/O redirection.
Add local flag to each trigger. It forces the trigger to be executed without the SSH wrapper when running inside the Docker container.
Add user on the fly and execute the ssh wrapper as the new user.
A new SSH wrapper to avoid clashing with internal user IDs.
Fix broken link in the doc.
Load the wrapper resource with the context classloader.
Load the wrapper as stream. Add resources to the build.
Add some useful scripts to start/stop the dispatcher and test SSH configuration.
